**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 28 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23 [Ghast Outlaw](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2091) **Source** [Pathfinder #183: Field of Maidens](/Sources.aspx?ID=145) pg. 45 **Perception** +15; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +19, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +19, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +16, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +21, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +18, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +19 **Str** +4 **Dex** +6 **Con** +3 **Int** +0 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +1 **Items** backpack with components for a [striking snare](/Equipment.aspx?ID=345), [infiltrator thieves' tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=58) --- **AC** 28 **Fort** +18 **Ref** +20 **Will** +16 **HP** 155 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Stench** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246)) 10 feet. A creature entering the aura or starting its turn in the aura must succeed at a DC 26 Fortitude save or become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (plus slowed 1 as long as it's sickened on a critical failure). While within the aura, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saves against [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) and to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** --- **Speed** 30 feet, burrow 5 feet **Melee** jaws +21 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 2d8+8 piercing plus ghast fever and paralysis **Melee** claw +21 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 2d6+8 slashing plus paralysis **Consume Flesh** ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The ghast is adjacent to the corpse of a creature that died within the last hour; **Effect** The ghast devours a chunk of the corpse and regains 6d6 Hit Points. It can regain Hit Points from any given corpse only once. **Ghast Fever** ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 26; **Stage 1** carrier with no ill effect (1 day); **Stage 2** 3d8 negative damage and regains half as many Hit Points from all healing (1 day); **Stage 3** as stage 2 (1 day); **Stage 4** 3d8 negative damage and gains no benefit from healing (1 day); **Stage 5** as stage 4 (1 day); **Stage 6** dead, and rises as a ghast the next midnight. **Paralysis** ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) Any living creature hit by a ghast's attack must succeed at a DC 26 Fortitude save or become [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28). It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save. **[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)** The ghast's Strikes deal an additional 2d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures. **Swift Leap** ([Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) The ghast jumps up to half its Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.
name: Ghast Outlaw
